meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cindy Stowell Garrett Levenbrook Tim Aten Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7422.

div.div:
Tim Aten game 8.
Cindy Stowell game 1.

td.p: Cindy Stowell, a science content developer from Austin, Texas
Garrett Levenbrook, a food executive from Montclair, New Jersey
Tim Aten, an editor from Vermilion, Ohio (whose 7-day cash winnings total $107,499)

tr.td: LAST NAME'S THE SAME
ALL ABOUT ANIMALS
THAT'S A GREEK LETTER
ALLITERATION
GEORGIA
HOLIDAY DUETS

tr.td: Tim
Garrett
Cindy!
THAT OLD-TIME RELIGION
NO STAN LEE CAMEO
BOOKS OF THE 1930s
THE MILITARY AT HOME
LESSER-KNOWN HISTORIC NAMES
(Alex: We take you...)
TO THE END"THE" DEGREE

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
